attributes.action: Bank holiday in honour of NHS and key workers
attributes.additional_details: It has been evident throughout covid-19 that there are hero’s amongst us. These are the people that put their lives at risk to help and support the United Kingdom. Therefore a bank holiday in honour of them is a small thank you and recognition of the hard work they have done.
attributes.background: It has been evident throughout covid-19 that there are hero’s amongst us. These are the people that put their lives at risk to help and support the United Kingdom. These people are the NHS and the key workers that continued to support and work tirelessly throughout the unprecedented times.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
